ygData.subject: Desmonus II

Sorry the post is so long, I got kinda bord.

* She looked around the great halls of the Alliance base, seeing them empty 
but sensing movement in the rooms around her.
She knew that she was late, but could care less. Nothing very important had 
happened while she had been gone, so there was no need to ask anyone what 
she had to catch up on.

Desmonus took in a deep breath and brushed herself off, stopping in the 
shadows of the hall and looking down at her sleek armor.
She twisted her torso a bit to get a look at the back of her thigh, 
wondering if it held any smudges or dirt that she had missed.
There was nothing, everything was clean.

She then ruffled her wings at her side for a moment, finally settling them 
against her shoulders to form a rather long cloak, the front claws acting as 
a clasp.
Desmonus then began to humm a rather complex tune, one which resembled the 
flowing melodise one would hear in a gothic quier.
Smooth and ever flowing.
She walked slowly down the hall, yet her head was bowed and her amber eyes 
closed, her body ever so slightly swaying to the ancient tune as she passed 
door after door.

It was a trick which she had learned many steller-cycles ago, a time that 
she could no longer remember but knew existed.
Her soft music was like a sonar, the sound waves bouncing off objects and 
then back to her, relaying the shape, size, scent and even color of whatever 
it had hit.
It was rather clever, but second nature to a half bat fuzor like herself.
While others might find it odd or even spectacular, she simply brushed it 
off as normal.

Desmonus turned a corner silently and slipped into the shadows of an unlit 
hall passage, the darkness closing around her true feminin form and covering 
her like a warm blanket.
As she passed a high air vent opening she suddenly stopped, the tips of her 
winge furrling around her ankles almost as if a wing had come up.
He had been here.
That was her first thought.
Desmonus raised her head towards the opening, finally opening her eyes and 
looking at the silver covering.
Her past intended prey had been herehe could still smell him.

The sleek and supple fembot hissed ever so quietly, her amber eyes shining 
as they glared at the vent opening.
If only she had been here earlier, when this male bot had come inside the 
base.
It would have been THEN that she would have caught him and feasted upon his 
appatizing mech-fluid.
And it just so happened, the stronger the bot she fed upon, the more energy 
her body would have recieved.
And by the scent of this male bot, she would have recieved an extreme amount 
of energy.

Desmonus then lowered her gaze from the opening and her eyes she did close 
and then were lost in the shadows, breathing in deep the scent so she would 
never forget it. Never forget just what power her prey held, and how she 
could tap into it...and share it.
Her lips curled in a smile that would have made the devel look twice, 
running her tongue over her teeth and feeling the poisonus tips of her two 
main kaynines slightly pierce it.
A prey with such energy was worth waiting for.*
